msgSnippet: Really you d just need a button or something to instantiate a test runner, right? Something like: public static void main(String[] args) {
messageBody:
Really you'd just need a button or something to
instantiate a test runner, right?

Something like:

public static void main(String[] args) {
junit.swingui.TestRunner tr =
new junit.swingui.TestRunner();
tr.run(AllTests.class);
}

-Eric
